factoids.banner: Tonight, at 9PM Please DO NOT switch off your appliances. It will cause grid blackouts due to entire country doing it at the same time.
State Electricity Boards have asked citizens NOT to switch off lights and appliances all at the same time as it could cause a blackout.
Tonight, at 9 PM, lets all go into our balconies and hold a ğŸª” or ğŸ•¯ï¸ to signify that we are all together in this fight against corona.
DO NOT use alcohol-based hand sanitizers before lighting diyas or candles. Alcohol is flammable.
Please stay indoors and DO NOT gather in groups. The virus is still out there!
